item.title: Trees need feathering, 14th December
item.description:
The trees along Sherbrooke Gardens have lost of low growth which is blocking the pavements and looks scruffy.

item.title: Overflowing bin on corner of Balfour Street and Victory Place., 14th December
item.description:
Every few days this bin is absolutely overflowing and rubbish, including take away food is always over the pavement. It's revolting. Likewise the bi at the other end of Balfour Street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victory Place, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car blocked street all day, 14th December
item.description:
The car in the photo has blocked the one-way road, for the most of the day! Cars have had to turnaround and it would be impossible for any emergency vehicles to get through. This is becoming a constant weekend issue - I believe we need double yellows on one-side.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Observatory Gardens, Kensington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pot hole, 14th December
item.description:
The last repair in July 25 has now failed and buses are shaking the houses 24/7. The entire bus stop in Merttins road needs to be resurfaced to prevent further damage to property.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Merttins Road, Nunhead, Greater London
